name: Rat Rampage
description:
Rat Rampage is a 3D stealth-platformer game where you are a rat trying to spread the plague in a city without getting caught.

Crawl through the houses and hide from the humans as you wait for your chance to bite them and spread the plague.

This game was made in 48 hours as a self set challenge under the theme of 'Its spreading'.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

E - Bite

T - Switch camera

ESC/P - Pause game

==============================

Credits:

This game was made by

Jelle Steinmann

Tim van Poppel

Roel Jansen

Tudor Boneanu

Sem Lefering

Used Assets:

Rat 3D model made by wta on Turbosquid.

Cheese 3D model made by paulobazzo on cgtrader.

Crate 3D model made by edson-lopes on cgtrader.

3D geometry and textures from Uppercut Games (City of Brass)
